title: Use the Construction Industry Scheme (CIS) online service

details.description: Sign up or log in to use the Construction Industry Scheme online service - you can use it to file your contractor monthly returns
details.more_information:
If you’re an existing user, just log in from the page on the HMRC website.

If you’re new to HMRC Online Services:

  1. Use the ‘register’ link.

  2. On the next page, use the ‘sign up to HMRC Online services’ link.
details.introduction: Sign up or log in to use the Construction Industry Scheme (CIS) online service - you can use it to file your monthly returns as a CIS contractor.
